subject: {{#is order_info.attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Your At-Home COVID-19 tests are ready forÂ pickup at the front checkout, {{{order_info.customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else is order_info.attributes.order_type 'ETW'}} {{#is order_info.attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} Your CVS locker order is ready, {{{order_info.customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else}} Your CVS order is ready for store pickup! {{/is}} {{else is order_info.attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} {{#is order_info.attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} Your CVS locker order is ready, {{{order_info.customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else}} Your Rx order is ready, {{{order_info.customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{/is}} {{else}} Your CVS order is ready for store pickup! {{/is}}

content.preview_text: {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Find out what you need to pick up your order in this email. {{else is attributes.order_type 'ETW'}} {{#is attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} Thanks for order #{{order_number}}. Use the CVS Locker code inside to get your Rx. See full order details in this email. {{else}} Find out what you need to pick up your order in this email. {{/is}} {{else is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} {{#is attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} Thanks for order #{{order_number}}. Use the CVS Locker code inside to get your Rx. See full order details in this email. {{else}} Your pickup barcode inside. Show it at the pharmacy counter to get your Rx. See full order details in this email. {{/is}} {{else}} Find out what you need to pick up your order in this email. {{/is}}
content.emailTitle: CVS Pharmacy Order Ready For Pickup Email

custom.cvs_footer: Terms of Use | Privacy Policy
custom.header:
{{{{raw}}}}{{#if (itemFlagFinder pickup_ready.order_items 'is_substitute' 'true')}}{{else}} {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}{{else is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}}{{else is attributes.order_type 'ETW'}}{{else}}{{/is}}{{#is attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}}{{/is}} {{/if}}

{{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Your order is ready for pickup at the front checkout, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} Your order is ready for pickup, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else is attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} Your order is ready for pickup, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else}} Your order is ready for pickup at the front checkout, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{/is}}

Item(s) from your order were out of stock. We've made the following substitution(s) below. We're sorry for the inconvenience.
Head to the checkout area at the front of the store and have your name and order number ready.

We will hold your order for 3 days after it's ready for pickup.
Head to the front checkout area at the front of the store and provide your name and order number.Â 
We'll hold your order for 3 days.
To avoid cancellation, pick up your Rx within the next 3 days.
To avoid cancellation, pick up your Rx within the next 3 days.
Head to the checkout area at the front of the store and have your name and order number ready.
Use this code to access your locker:
{{attributes.locker_pin}}
{{{{/raw}}}}

custom.seeOrderDetails: View order details
custom.legal:
{{{{raw}}}}
You received this email to confirm the action noted above. Your email address will not be saved or used for any other purpose unless you chose to sign up for special email offers when you registered. You can change your email preference in My Account at any time. We value your privacy and the security of personal information and never give or sell any specific information about you to any manufacturer or direct marketers. {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Please note that At-Home COVID-19 tests are nonrefundable. {{else}} If you have questions or concerns about how we protect your privacy, read our Privacy Policy. {{/is}}

If you have any questions about your order, please call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}}.

{{#isnt attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Please check our Return Policy if you want to return a store item.

{{/isnt}} Â©Copyright CVS.com
One CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895
{{{{/raw}}}}
custom.pickupBarcode:
{{{{raw}}}} {{#isnt @root.attributes.store_area 'LOCKER'}} {{#if attributes.pickup_barcode}}
Show this barcode at the pharmacy counter.
Pharmacy Team: Scan barcode for prepaid order number.
If you don't see the barcode, you can:
  • Tell the pharmacy your date of birth
  • View the barcode in the CVS Pharmacy app
If someone else is picking up your Rx, forward them this email.
{{/if}} {{/isnt}} {{{{/raw}}}}
custom.pickupCallout:
{{{{raw}}}}
{{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} We'll hold your order for 3 days. If you don't pick up your order in that timeframe, your order will be canceled. If you no longer need your order, please cancel it by calling your store. {{else}} You have prepaid for this order, so a hold will be placed on your payment account for 6 days. If you don't pick up your order in that timeframe, your prepayment will expire and you'll have to pay again in person. However, your original payment could remain pending with your bank for up to 14 days, depending on your bank's policies. {{/is}}
{{{{/raw}}}}

callout.text: This happens sometimes. The first thing to do is to check the bushes - did ya check the bushes? Always gotta check those bushes.
